GuardianAdded(address).notice: Emitted when setting a new guardian for the target

GuardianRemoved(address).notice: Emitted when removing an existing guardian for the target

GuardiansThresholdChanged(uint256).notice: Emitted when changing the guardian threshold

RecoveryProcessSuccessful(uint256,addres.notice: Emitted when the recovery process is finished by the controller who reached the guardian threshold and submitted the string that produce the secretHash

SecretHashChanged(bytes32).notice: Emitted when changing the secret hash

SelectedNewController(uint256,address,ad.notice: Emitted when a guardian select a new potentiel controller address for the target

constructor.notice: Sets the target and the owner addresses
